title: League Of Legends kicked from champion select for maintenance.
body: So i was playing a normal league of legends game, when the game ended i close league and re-opened it.It said that i was disconnected and none of my friends were online.I got into champion select and it kicked me for maintenance i think. I got after 1 min it reconnected me to the champion select where i had to exit myself from league because it stuck. I think that it's because league is patching. I really don't know can you help me?

replies.body: We don't have a patch going out right now, but that can sometimes happen if the client notices some damaged game files. If this started a forced repatch, let that finish and check it in a practice game.
